title: Hunted By The Beast

When the beast-cursed man she glimpsed in the woods shows up in her room, sniffing her panties, she knows it, and panics.Except why does she want him? Or, if she refuses, what then? Danya is about to find out just what it means to be Hunted by the Beast.(Hunted by the Beast is a loosely based erotic re-imagining of the classic story Beauty and the Beast)
